body.p:
Newport Ky Octr 31st 1861
Hon B Magoffin
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir
Tho' not personally acquainted with you I have taken the liberty to forward the accompanying ^petition^ on behalf of Charles May.
Allow me to urge upon your attention the character of the petitioners as showing this to be a meritorious case justly calling for the exercise of the executive clemency --

I am most respectfully yours &c.
F. M. Webster --
